channel.title: Favorite creature from any Half life game!
channel.description: Well, the title says it all. My favorite is the Gargantua! What a surprise! Or maybe the headcrab zombie...

item.source: Favorite creature from any Half life game!

item.title: Favorite creature from any Half life game!
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
I love headcrabs, they are so fucking cute! I want to have one as a pet, as Kleiners Lamarr, but you have to train them very hard! I still love the headcrabs, I remember when I was going through Ravenholm with notarget and shot everyzombie so that the headcrabs was remaining. Once again, they are cute little bastards.
PS: Yes, I have played Half-Life 1, 2, ep 1 & 2.
:freeman:

Read full topic
item.source: Favorite creature from any Half life game!

item.title: Favorite creature from any Half life game!
item.dc:creator: Ksch
item.description:
My favorites must be Gargantua or Gonome. They always scare me! I hate being chased by Gargantua’s, like in “Power Up!” when you are going to turn on the power, you hear this stomping and “grunting”, then they put fire on you.

Read full topic
item.source: Favorite creature from any Half life game!

item.title: Favorite creature from any Half life game!
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
I like the Xen Trees and Xen Electric Lamps. The Trees freak me out every time I see them. I always forget that they don’t like being touched and wind up bumping into one whilst circle strafing an AGrunt. The XELs give me some sort of morale boost. they’re so cute and nice to have around.

Outside of HL1 I like the Striders and Hunters, just not when they’re together (all the HL games were all pretty normal difficulty for me, not too hard, not too easy, but then that fight at the end of EP2 took me two weeks to beat, countless tries. I hated it). I’ve never run a Hunter over with the car… I like the Zombine too. It’s so satisfying to tear the grenade out of his hand and blow up a nearby crowd of Fast Zombies.

Read full topic
item.source: Favorite creature from any Half life game!

item.title: Favorite creature from any Half life game!
item.dc:creator: DrasarSalman
item.description:
I nearly got stuck in ep2 when I saw it was a poison zombie on the other side of a door, then he smashed through the door when I was picking up some ammo boxes around in the room.

Read full topic
item.source: Favorite creature from any Half life game!

item.title: Favorite creature from any Half life game!
item.dc:creator: Hypno-Toad
item.description:
HL1:
I liked the controllers because they were such an easy kill (Just three shots with a Magnum on hard)
My favorite however were the HECU, because they just stood still and sprayed (missed) at me while i just ran up to his face and killed him with a double-shotty blast

HL2:
All zombies, especially the poison one, for some reason, the poison zombies scared the living shit out of me. A lot more than the first time I saw the Nihilanth, Gargantua, Multiple Striders, Multiple Hunters grouped with the Multiple Striders, and the Gonad combined.

Read full topic
